data.text: Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik ikwera ka in gi mirima
Nikech aserni magi osechwoya,
Mirimbi mager osemiyo ringra obedo maonge ngima maber;
Ketho ma asekethogo oima
Adhondena otimo tutu kendo dungʼ marach
Adolora kendo akulora piny chuth odiechiengʼ duto,
Ondingʼa rama gi rem malich;
Denda ool kendo tekra orumo chuth;
Gik ma chunya dwaro duto ongʼereni maber, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Chunya gwecho, tekra orumo;
Osiepena gi anywolana ok dwar nena nikech adhondena;
Joma dwaro kawo ngimana ochiko obadhogi,
Achalo ngʼama ite odino, ma ok nyal winjo wach,
Achalo gi ngʼat ma ok winj wach,
To in ema ariti, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Nimar ne awacho niya, “Kik iyie mondo gisungrena,
Nimar achiegni podho,
Ahulo kethona;
Wasika molwora ngʼeny;
Joma chulo rach kuom ber ma asetimonegi
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik ijwangʼa;
Bi piyo mondo ikonya,
